name: places/ChIJ96MCUDBZwokRd1JVf_J3H3o
formattedAddress: 320 W 38th St Suite 2005, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 320 W 38th St Suite 2005, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text: They installed my roof in the fall about 3 years ago and by winter it was leaking. I noticed they did not completely finish my roof when they sent me pics of what they were repairing because someone (their boss I’m guessing) told the roofers not to replace certain parts of my roof. I am giving them 2 stars, because they came back to finish my roof after it leaked from my bedroom to the kitchen after they replaced two roofs in my house to brand new, so I thought. I have a 75 year warranty on the metal roof and the asphalt roof has a 25 year warranty. Yet, I can’t get a hold of anyone to come back to repair again.  Initially, I was informed that they knew how to connect asphalt to a metal roof in an old historic house. I suggested just using metal for the whole job because my asphalt roof order had to be changed, but they refused to change my order to 2 metal roofs. Now, my bedroom ceiling is leaking again. Their email addresses are bouncing and their number keeps saying it’s busy. They took advantage of us as an older couple and then told us if we call them again they will charge us for the repair. I don’t recommend this roofing company since the BBB gives them a F rating for not getting back to them to solve matters like these. They replaced my roof 3 years ago and now it is leaking like it was never replaced. They seemed like nice people and good business men, but now I’m stuck with costly repairs, because they won’t come back and do the job right. Beware!

originalText.text: This company has charged my company two times. I'm in dispute over the charges of $2,132.75 and $2,532.75 with my bank. I have tried to call this company to inform them of their mistake without luck which just tells me they are trying to scam.  If someone would like to discuss this issue I suggest you respond to this review and I will be more than happy to find a resolution with them. I would not recommend using this company if they randomly charge out of state people who have never even heard of them before. SCAMMERS!!!!!

originalText.text: very unprofessional . roof still leaking. still waiting for then to finish job after 2 months. agreed to replace old singles. never did. about to sue in small claims

text.text: very unprofessional . roof still leaking. still waiting for then to finish job after 2 months. agreed to replace old singles. never did. about to sue in small claims

originalText.text:
One more update: I eventually had to wait until I was able to be physically at my parents home and, found another contractor come a secure the siding. He was too embarrassed to charge for the service as it took him 2 minutes to resolve the issue.
Update: After several more emails an employee came  the night of December 4, 2020 . Based on the pictures I could get the sliding was back in place but damaged. Fast forward to March Sunday, March 28, 2021 the one piece of siding disrupted when installing the roof has pulled away from the house now damaged 3 more pieces of siding. The flashing installed when the new roof was added is pulling away as well. I'm hiring a company to fix the issue and inspect the work done. The roof was completed end of July 2020. All of this could have been prevented if the company fixed the issue when it was brought to their attention in August 2020. Seemed odd that after seeing all these glowing reviews that for this couple customer service just wasn't available. Not sure why?
You offered to rectify via email 4 days ago and then I
heard nothing. Im resorting to posting a review to get the issue resolved. I used their services to have a new roof added to my home and garage. Work was done well however an issue arose due the installation. It has been 4 months of attempting to get someone from the company to repair the issue. Several calls and emails promising to make it right yet nothing. Now winter is coming and part of the house is exposed to the elements causing an issue we didn't have when their services were provided.

originalText.text: Roofing Insiders Company was very attentive and responsive to our phone call about the leak in our roof, they came as soon as possible and checked the said roof that needs to repair. So then, they promptly repaired it. We would definitely recommend a better roofing company to anyone thinking about re-roofing in the near future.
